text: President Donald Trump sparked outrage after he retweeted a cartoon ` ` Trump Train'' running into a person bearing the CNN logo for a head on Tuesday morning. He has since deleted the tweet. ` ` Fake news can't stop the Trump Train,'' the cartoon meme, which was initially shared by one of his supporters, was captioned.
